### John Congdon

![PHP Architect Logo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/89408/255421945-03e3e32b-0634-4ef7-9d8e-18bdf315883e.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..iBpCPEDXdLrQ9lPsY3ZdivaZsnvNBlXkjoHhVI09T_o)

Over 20 years of professional development, starting in the late 90's using PERL, and then switching my main focus to PHP in 2003.
CEO of [DiegoDev Group][ws_diegodev] and [PHP Architect][ws_phparch].
Podcaster on [PHPUgly][ws_phpugly] and [php[podcast]][ws_phparch].

---
